body.content:
Dear John ,  Following your prompt response.
Below are brief on the Investment Portfolio:Minimum /Maximum Funding: 1 Million - 10 BILLION USD
Placement Opens to:   Entrepreneurs, Corporations and Investors
Funding Type: Loan Investment
Funding Rate: 3% Interest Rate per annum
Duration: 10 -20 year - Renewable tenure
Loan Collateral / Security: Surety Bond premium cost 2%
Sectors of Interest: Oil & Gas, Agriculture, Health, Aviation, Tourism, Retail, Real Estate, Construction, IT & Communications, Technology, Education, Energy, Engineering, Utilities, Telecom, Mining, Maritime, Health Sector and host of other profitable ventures. Etc If you have shovel ready projects in the sectors stated above send forth your business executive summaries and we will be glad to review and consider them and also to schedule a conference call any time with you.

Loan will require Due diligence underwriting  insurance performance bond is mandatory while JV will require Professional risk assessment which would come at a cost.

Before we proceed, any  client that is securing an insurance performance bond in UAE is to accord the borrower the eligibility for unrestricted investment portfolios from  Asset Alliance Finance Limited on a non-collateral Basis under a registered UAE entity. The cost of the bond depends on the volume of the loan disbursement to the borrower therefore it will be cost out after the loan approval is secured.

Kindly provide your whatsapp number and your executive business summary to enable me to introduce you directly to Dr Hussian Mohammed Director financial shorty advisor to  Asset Alliance Finance Limited or chief advisor Aryeed Farid Abdullah for further proceedings.

Once I hear from you with the information stated above we proceed.

thank you.
Abdul Malik D
